socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: total annual cost per patient (direct medical, direct non-medical, indirect)
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: Cost of illness associated with Niemann-Pick disease type C in the UK

socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: annual cost of miglustat therapy to NHS
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: Cost of miglustat (Zavesca) therapy in the UK

socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: annual net price of Miplyffa therapy
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: Annual cost of Miplyffa (arimoclomol) therapy

socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: annual patient out-of-pocket co-pay for miglustat
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: Patient co-pay for miglustat therapy

socioeconomic_analysis.justification: A peer-reviewed European cost-of-illness study from the UK quantifies substantial annual societal costs; additional drug cost data further illustrate economic burden, but no Spanish cost-of-illness studies were identified.
